The <meter> element is great for displaying quantities.

You can:
1๏ธโฃ use pseudo-elements for a visual description
2๏ธโฃ define low/high/optimum values
3๏ธโฃ and use default styles that represent them
4๏ธโฃ or even define your own! ๐จ

@DevTwitter
The six stages of debugging:

1. That can't happen. 
2. Hmmm. That doesn't happen on my machine.
3. Weird, That shouldn't happen.
4. Wh-Why does that happen?
5. Ohhhhhh, I see.
6. How did that ever work?

@DevTwitter | <Mohammad Malekpour/>
Most Software Developers don't code all day. You should never feel guilty for not writing code for 8 straight hours.

Software development is also about thinking, taking breaks, thinking again, and then writing a few lines of code, testing whether they work afterward.

What's new in PHP 8.1

- enums
- fibers
- array unpacking with string keys
- new in initializers
- readonly properties
- first-class callables
- the never type
- array_is_list 
- and more, so exciting!

Full phone number database of Clubhouse is up for sale on the Darknet It contains 3.8 billion phone numbers. These are not just members but also people in contact lists that were synced. Chances are high that you are listed even if you haven't had a Clubhouse login.

 # Project-wide Gradle settings.

# IDE (e.g. Android Studio) users:
# Gradle settings configured through the IDE *will override*
# any settings specified in this file.

# For more details on how to configure your build environment visit
# http://www.gradle.org/docs/current/userguide/build_environment.html

# Specifies the JVM arguments used for the daemon process.
# The setting is particularly useful for tweaking memory settings.
# Default value: -Xmx2048m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m
 org.gradle.jvmargs=-Xmx4096m -XX:MaxPermSize=1024m -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8

# When configured, Gradle will run in incubating parallel mode.
# This option should only be used with decoupled projects. More details, visit
# http://www.gradle.org/docs/current/userguide/multi_project_builds.html#sec:decoupled_projects
 org.gradle.parallel=true

Dear Citizens of Iran, 

We have obtained a data leak of about 9GB of sharif.edu and its subdomains.

We will not share student information. However, information about the university administration will be published on our telegram channel.

Highlights include:
- Experimental Permission Model
- A synchronous import.meta.resolve
- Stable Test Runner
- V8 JavaScript engine updated to 11.3
- Single Executable Apps
- Ada to 2.0

11. TCM Security - Entry level courses for cybersecurity.
12. EchoCTF - Train your offensive and defensive skills.

15. OverTheWire - Security concepts via challenges.
16. PentesterLab - Learn web-app penetration testing.

    ->where('active', true)
    ->whereNone([
        'first_name',
        'last_name',
        'email'
    ], 'LIKE', 'ali%')
    ->get();
ุญุงูุง ุงู ฺฉุฏุ ุชู SQL ุจู ุงู ุตูุฑุช ุฏุฑูุงุฏ:

SELECT*
FROM users
WHERE active = true
AND
NOT (first_name LIKE'ali%' 
OR last_name LIKE'ali%'
OR email LIKE'ali%')

ุฑูุฏุฑูฺฏ ุณูุช ุณุฑูุฑ (SSR) - Server Side Rendering: 

ุฏุฑ ุงู ุฑูุดุ ุตูุญู ูุจ ุฏุฑ ุณูุช ุณุฑูุฑ ุฑูุฏุฑ ุดุฏู ู ุจู ุตูุฑุช HTML ฺฉุงูู ุจู ูุฑูุฑฺฏุฑ ฺฉุงุฑุจุฑ ุงุฑุณุงู ูโุดูุฏ. ุงู ููุน ุฑูุฏุฑูฺฏ ุจุฑุง ุณุฆู (SEO) ู ุฏุณุชุฑุณ ุณุฑุน ุจู ูุญุชูุง ุงููู ุจุณุงุฑ ููุซุฑ ุงุณุช.

ุฑูุฏุฑูฺฏ ุณูุช ฺฉุงุฑุจุฑ - ฺฉูุงูุช (CSR) - Client Side Rendering:

ุฑูุฏุฑูฺฏ ุงุณุชุงุชฺฉ (SSG) - Static Site Generation:

ุฑูุฏุฑูฺฏ ูุจุฑุฏ (ISR) - Incremental Static Regeneration:

ูพูพุฑ ฺฉ ููุฏุงุฑ ุซุงุจุช ู ูุญุฑูุงูู ุงุณุช ฺฉู ุจู ูพุณูุฑุฏ ุงุถุงูู ูโุดูุฏุ ุงูุง ุจุฑ ุฎูุงู Saltุ ุงู ููุฏุงุฑ ุฏุฑ ูพุงฺฏุงู ุฏุงุฏู ุฐุฎุฑู ููโุดูุฏ. ุฏุฑ ุนูุถุ ุงู ููุฏุงุฑ ุฏุฑ ฺฉุฏ ุจุฑูุงูู ููุณ (Application Code) ูุฑุงุฑ ูโฺฏุฑุฏ.

ุจู ุนููุงู ูุซุงูุ ุฏุฑ ฺฉุฏ ุฒุฑ:

// register.php

add_user_to_database($username, $pwd_hashed);

ุชุณุช ุฑฺฏุฑุณูู (Regression_Testing)

ุชุณุช ุจุงุฑ (Load_Testing)

ุชุณุช ุงุณุชุฑุณ (Stress_Test)

Sometimes, developers forget the easy and simple things that make SQL queries so much faster.

- Avoid SELECT * always list the columns you need.
- Skip cursors and subqueries when อpossible JOINs are faster and cleaner.
- Use Indexes to speed up WHERE, JOIN, and ORDER BY operations.
- Run EXPLAIN ANALYZE to see whatโs slowing things down.
- Test queries on real data to ensure they work as expected.

5. ุจูููโุณุงุฒ ุทู ุฏูุงูฺฉ (Dynamic Spectrum Optimization - DSO) ู ุฏุณุชุฑุณ ุจู ฺฉุงูุงู ุบุฑ ุงุตู (Non-Primary Channel Access - NPCA)

ูฺฉุชู ุจุนุฏ ฺฉุด ฺฉุฑุฏู ููู ฺุฒ ูุณุชโฆ
Cache All The Things
If you canโt make something faster, a good alternative is to cache it. Things like complex view compilation and external API calls benefit greatly from caching. Especially if the resultant data doesnโt change often.

ู ุณุฑ ฺุฒุงุฑู ูุดู throttle ฺฉุฑุฏ
Throttle Bottlenecks
But what about operations you canโt cache? Things like delivering an email, sending a webhook, or even logging in can be abused by users of an application. Essentially, any expensive operation that canโt be cached should be throttled.

ุจุฑุง ู ุณุฑ ูพุฑูุณู ูุง ูู ูุดู job queue ู ูฺฉุงูุฒู ูุง async ุฏุฑ ูุธุฑ ฺฏุฑูุช
Do It Later (In a Job)
Jobs allow us to defer work to another process through queueing systems often backed by Redis. Exporting a dataset, activating a subscription, or processing a payment are all great examples of job-worthy work

ูพุฑูุฒ ุงุฒ ูุชุงูพุฑูฺฏุฑููฺฏ
Use Metaprogramming Sparingly
Changing a programโs structure at runtime is a powerful feature. In a highly dynamic language like Ruby, there are significant performance costs associated to metaprogramming.

ุฏููุณุชู ุชูุงูุช O(1) ู O(n) ุจุฑุง ููุงุณ ูพุฐุฑ ุจูุฏู ุฎู ูููู
Know the difference between O(n) and O(1)
What O(n) and O(1) mean is that there are two kinds of operations. O(n) is an operation that scales in time with size, and O(1) is one that is constant in time regardless of size.

ูุซูุง ุฌุง ุขุฑุงู ุจูุชุฑู ุงุฒ hash ุงุณุชูุงุฏู ุจุดู ฺูู lookup ฺฉุฑุฏู ุชู hash ูุงุฑุบ ุงุฒ ุงูุฏุงุฒู O(1) ูุณุช


Allocate Less

If used improperly, dangerous methods can lead to unwanted side effects in your code. A best practice to follow is to avoid mutating global state while leveraging mutation on local state.

ฑ - Parsing HTML

ฒ - Parsing CSS
ูุฑูุฑฺฏุฑ ฺฉุฏูุง CSS ุฑุง ูุฒ ุฏุฑุงูุช ฺฉุฑุฏู ู ุขูโูุง ุฑุง ุจู ฺฉ ุณุงุฎุชุงุฑ ุฏุฑุฎุช ุจู ูุงู CSSOM (CSS Object Model) ุชุจุฏู ูโฺฉูุฏ. ฺุทูุฑ ูุดูุ

 ุขูุงุฒูู ุจุฑุง ูพุดููุงุฏ ูุญุตููุงุช ูุฑุชุจุท ุงุฒ ฺฉ Product Graph (ฺฏุฑุงู ูุญุตูู) ุงุณุชูุงุฏู ูโฺฉููุ ุชู ุงู ฺฏุฑุงู ุฑุงุณโูุง (Nodes) ูุดุงูโุฏููุฏูโ ูุญุตููุงุชูุ ุฏุฑ ุญุงู ฺฉู ุงูโูุง (Edges) ุฑุงุจุทู ูุงู ูุญุตููุงุช ุฑู ูุดูู ูุฏูุ ูุซูุง ุฎุฑุฏ ููุฒูุงู (Co-Purchase) ุง ุจุงุฒุฏุฏ ููุฒูุงู (Co-View).

ูุฏู ฺฏุฑุงู ูุญุตูู ุงูู ฺฉู ูุญุตููุงุช ฺฉู ุงุญุชูุงู ุฎุฑุฏ ููุฒูุงู ุงููุง ุจุงูุงุณุช ุฑู ูพุดููุงุฏ ุจุฏู.
ฺฉ ูุณุฆูู ุงุตูุ "Selection Bias" ูุณุชุ ุนู ุงฺฏู ูุญุตูู (ูุซู ฺฉุงูุฑ ุขููู) ุจู ุฏูู ููุฌูุฏ ฺฉู ูุดูู ุฏุงุฏู ูุดูุ ุฏุงุฏูโูุง ุฎุฑุฏ ฺฏูุฑุงูโฺฉููุฏู ุฎูุงูุฏ ุจูุฏ.

 ุขูุงุฒูู ูุดฺฉู Selection Bias ุฑู ุจุง ุงุถุงูู ฺฉุฑุฏู ุฑูุงุจุท ุฏูู ูุฑุญููโุง (Two-stage relations) ุญู ูโฺฉูู.
ูุญุตููุงุช ุฌุฏุฏ (Cold Start) ูู ู ุชู ุงู ุณุณุชู ูุซู ุจูู ุณุณุชูโูุง ุฑฺฉุงููุฏุฑ ฺุงูุด ูุณุชุ ฺุทูุฑ ุญูุด ฺฉุฑุฏูุ

 ุขูุงุฒูู ุจุง ฺฉูฺฉ Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) ุงุฒ ุทุฑู ุงุฏฺฏุฑ Embeddingsุ ูุญุตููุงุช ุฌุฏุฏ ุฑู ุจู ฺฏุฑุงู ูุญุตูู ุงุถุงูู ูโฺฉูู ุชุง ูพุดููุงุฏูุง ูุฑุชุจุท ุฑู ุจุชููู ุงุฑุงูู ุจุฏู.
ุฏุฑ GNNโูุง ุฏู Embedding ุจุฑุง ูุฑ ูุญุตูู ุชููุฏ ูุดูุ Source (ุจุฑุง ูุญุตูู ฺฉูุฆุฑ ุดุฏู) ู Target (ุจุฑุง ูุญุตูู ูพุดููุงุฏ).

ุงูโูุง ุงุฒ ุทุฑู ุฑุงุจุทูโูุง Co-Purchase ู Co-View ุจู ุฑูุฒุฑุณุงู ูุดู ู ูพุดููุงุฏูุง ุฏููโุชุฑ ุงุฑุงู ูุฏู.
ุชู ุจุฎุด ูพุดููุงุฏ ุฎุฑุฏ ูุฌุฏุฏุ ุณุณุชู ุงุญุชูุงู ุฎุฑุฏ ุฏูุจุงุฑู ู ูุญุตูู ูุซูุง ุฎูุฑ ุฏูุฏูู ุฑู ุจุฑ ุงุณุงุณ ุชุงุฑุฎฺู ุฎุฑุฏ (Purchase History) ู ุฒูุงู ุขุฎุฑู ุฎุฑุฏ ูพุดโุจู ูโฺฉููุ ู CTR ุฑู ุงูุฒุงุด ูโุฏู.

ุขูุงุฒูู ุชู ุจุญุซ ูพุดููุงุฏ ุฎุฑุฏ ูุฌุฏุฏ ุงุฒ ูุฏูโูุง ูุฎุชูู ุจุฑุง ุงู ูพุดโุจูโูุง ุงุณุชูุงุฏู ูโฺฉูู:

- ูุชุงูพุฑุงููพุชูฺฏ (Meta Prompting): ุงุณุชูุงุฏู ุงุฒ ฺฉ ูุฏู ุฒุจุงู ุฏฺฏุฑ ุจุฑุง ุจูุจูุฏ ู ุงุตูุงุญ ูพุฑุงููพุชโูุง ุงุตู ุจู ุตูุฑุช ุฎูุฏฺฉุงุฑ.

- ุจูููโุณุงุฒ ฺฏุฑุงุฏุงู (Gradient-Based Optimization): ุงุณุชูุงุฏู ุงุฒ ุชฺฉูฺฉโูุง ุฑุงุถ ุจุฑุง ุชูุธู ุฏูู ูพุฑุงููพุชโูุง ุจุฑ ุงุณุงุณ ูุนุงุฑูุง ุนููฺฉุฑุฏ.

- ุงุจุฒุงุฑูุง ุฎูุฏฺฉุงุฑุณุงุฒ ูุงููุฏ DSPy: ุงุณุชูุงุฏู ุงุฒ ฺฉุชุงุจุฎุงููโูุง ฺฉู ูุฑุขูุฏ ุจูููโุณุงุฒ ูพุฑุงููพุช ุฑุง ุณุงุฏูโุชุฑ ู ููุงุณโูพุฐุฑุชุฑ ูโฺฉููุฏ.
